email_body: maybe they're for more sophisticated palates From: Kim Ward/ENRON@enronXgate on 05/09/2001 02:27 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: RE: I pawned them off on my unsuspecting coworker - Phil.
